name: Continuum (itch) (ahubun, Xspree, Alfamajor, Jen // Paladin Ink, Chaseoqueso)
name_original: Continuum (itch) (ahubun, Xspree, Alfamajor, Jen // Paladin Ink, Chaseoqueso)
description:
Continuum is a space fantasy roguelike game where you play as Atlan, a space pirate searching for loot. After stumbling into an "abandoned" space station, Atlan finds himself stuck in an endless time loop, desperately trying to end the curse and break out of the ever-changing wizard tower. Along the way, Atlan collects loot, meets colorful shopkeepers who were once members of the ship's crew, and faces challenging foes!

To see controls, click "Controls" under "Settings."
